name: Poke Ball
description: The simplest type of Poké Ball

name: Great Ball
description: It is slightly better than the regular Poké Ball

name: Ultra Ball
description: It is twice as good as a regular Poké Ball

name: Master Ball
description: A very rare Poké Ball that never fails in an attempt to catch a Pokémon.

name: Friendship Bracelet
description: Causes certain pokémon to evolve when leveled up.

name: Mega Evolution
description: Transforms your pokémon into its mega form!

name: X Mega Evolution
description: Transforms your pokémon into its X mega form!

name: Y Mega Evolution
description: Transforms your pokémon into its Y mega form!
